https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j7vfi9M0GwOvn5bywzheF7oQ7w.jpg The story of an idealist's rise to power in the world of Louisiana politics and the corruption that leads to his ultimate downfall. Based on the1946 Pulitzer Prize-winning novel written by Robert Penn Warren, loosely based on the story of real-life politician Huey Long. All the King's Men
